detailsData.title: Experienced Counsel
detailsData.content: Soroka & Associates handles a wide array of litigation needs on behalf of personal injury, criminal defense, and family law clients in Columbus and throughout Central Ohio. We take on the tough cases that other firms may not be equipped to handle, and prepare every case for a jury.

detailsData.title: Personal Injury Experts
detailsData.content: Our Columbus personal injury lawyers are here to help you pursue legal options that can help you protect your future. We handle complex personal injury lawsuits involving catastrophic injuries such as traumatic brain injuries, spinal cord injuries, and wrongful death.

detailsData.title: Effective Defense Strategies
detailsData.content: Our Columbus criminal defense attorneys represent clients facing felony and misdemeanor charges in state or federal courts. We know what’s at stake and provide effective defense strategies to protect your rights and future.

detailsData.title: Family Law Support
detailsData.content: Soroka & Associates assists clients with divorce, child custody, property division, and spousal support. We aim to resolve matters as quickly as possible with compassion and litigation experience.

address: 503 South Front Street, Suite 205, Columbus, OH 43215
subHeading: Experienced counsel for litigation matters in Ohio
valueProp: Under the Sixth and Seventh Amendments of the United States Constitution, you are guaranteed the right to a jury of your peers. If you are facing a moment where you must exercise that right – because you have been hurt through another’s negligence or are charged with a crime, you deserve to have a litigation team with experience, knowledge, and resources on your side.
